description: An MCP Server to utilize Codelogic's rich software dependency data in your AI programming assistant.

environmentVariables.name: CODELOGIC_SERVER_HOST
environmentVariables.description: url to the CodeLogic server e.g. https://myco.app.codelogic.com

environmentVariables.name: CODELOGIC_WORKSPACE_NAME
environmentVariables.description: the workspace name that your code is scanned into

environmentVariables.name: CODELOGIC_DEBUG_MODE
environmentVariables.description: When enabled, additional debug files such as timing_log.txt and impact_data*.json will be generated. Defaults to false
